description: Eisenstein series E_12(q) (alternate convention E_6(q)), multiplied by 691.
references: R. C. Gunning, Lectures on Modular Forms. Princeton Univ. Press, Princeton, NJ, 1962, p. 53.
N. Koblitz, Introduction to Elliptic Curves and Modular Forms, Springer-Verlag, 1984, see p. 111.
J.-P. Serre, Course in Arithmetic, Chap. VII, Section 4.
links: Index entries for sequences related to Eisenstein series
maple: E := proc(k) local n,t1; t1 := 1-(2*k/bernoulli(k))*add(sigma[k-1](n)*q^n,n=1..60); series(t1,q,60); end; E(12);
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
